events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product was not what I expected. I would like to request a refund because it doesn't match the description.
The issue has been categorized under the 'Refund' cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the product didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so I can proceed with the refund process?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 123456789, and I’ve attached the photos showing the product as it arrived.
We have reviewed the photos and have approved your refund request. You will receive your money back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund process has been completed and confirmed. The customer is informed that the issue is resolved.
Following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been formally closed after confirming the refund was successfully received by the customer.
